Uses of Class
controllers.APIController

  • Packages that use APIController 
    Package Description
    controllers
    Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests.
    controllers.admin
    Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests for ADMIN users.
    controllers.members
    Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests by MIDATA members.
    controllers.providers
    Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests by HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS.
    controllers.research
    Package containing controllers that answer the different types of webservice requests by RESEARCHERS.

    • Uses of APIController in controllers

      Subclasses of APIController in controllers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Application
      Member login, registration and password reset functions
      class  AutoRun
      Automatically run plugins once a day for auto import of records
      class  Circles
      functions for managing consents
      class  Developers
      login and registration for developers
      class  Market
      functions for controlling the "market" of plugins
      class  Plugins
      functions for managing MIDATA plugins
      class  PluginsAPI
      API functions to be used by MIDATA plugins
      class  PortalConfig
      function for reading and writing the portal configuration of each user
      class  QuickRegistration 
      class  Records
      functions for handling the records
      class  Tasking
      functions for managing user tasks
      class  UserGroups
      Management functions of user groups
      class  Users
      user related functions

    • Uses of APIController in controllers.admin

      Subclasses of APIController in controllers.admin 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Administration
      functions for user administration.

    • Uses of APIController in controllers.members

      Subclasses of APIController in controllers.members 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HealthProvider
      functions about interaction with health providers

    • Uses of APIController in controllers.providers

      Subclasses of APIController in controllers.providers

      class  Providers
      functions for healthcare providers

    • Uses of APIController in controllers.research

      Subclasses of APIController in controllers.research 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Researchers
      login and registration functions for researchers
      class  Studies
      functions about studies to be used by researchers
